re technical equipment for hello propose have more professional one we intent use microphone for future editions also regarding cable was referring have thanks for help date wednesday re technical equipment for thank you can you please advise microphone model can we buy cheapest one or you need something more professional cable you need kind regards administrator sent wednesday re technical equipment for hi everyone we experience with wireless unfortunately unable advise suggest asking our suppliers about wireless or similar wireless ones reviewed here cables you wrote if you meant inches roughly meter we plenty if you meant meters such have be ordered our ones much much shorter than sent re technical equipment for hi can you please advise equipment models fit needs kind regards administrator sent monday technical equipment for dear we need your help purchase some technical equipment for kick off costs be covered budget can you please give some proposals prices for below headset for speakers one without big pick up or lapel we would prefer use microphone cables cable we use for presentations thanks have great week
